info.name: Matcha Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Matcha backend - all modules and endpoints

item.name: Health & Status
item.description: Operational endpoints to check service health, readiness for dependencies, and basic metrics. Useful for monitoring and troubleshooting.

item.name: Social
item.description: Follow system endpoints. Use these to follow/unfollow users and fetch your followers/following lists.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Auth lifecycle including email/password registration, login, OAuth providers, and multi-factor operations.

item.name: User Profile
item.description: Current user profile management. Includes profile read/update, avatar upload, logout(s), and profile-centric lists: stats, likes, saves.
User profile management and email verification.

item.name: Devices
item.description: Manage the current device for notifications and sessions. Unified manage endpoint supports register/list/revoke.

item.name: Sessions
item.description: User sessions listing (placeholder). Future improvements will expose active sessions.

item.name: Communities
item.description: Community CRUD and membership. Use toggle-membership for a single endpoint to join or leave.

item.name: Posts
item.description: Public and community posts. Unified endpoints for voting and save toggling simplify integration.

item.name: Comments
item.description: Post-specific comment CRUD and related info (threads, stats). All comment operations are scoped to specific posts with realtime WebSocket support.

request.description: Get all comments for a specific post. Supports sorting and pagination.
Create a new comment for a specific post. Requires authentication.
Create a reply to an existing comment. The parentId should be the ID of the comment you're replying to.
Get a specific comment by its ID.
Update a comment. Only the author can edit their own comment.
Delete a comment. Only the author, post owner, or moderators can delete comments.
Vote on a comment. Value: 1 (upvote), -1 (downvote), 0 (remove vote).
Get a comment and all its replies (thread).
Get statistics for a specific comment.

item.name: WebSocket Events
item.description: Realtime WebSocket events for comments and chat functionality.

request.description: WebSocket connection to join a post room for realtime comment updates.
Listen for realtime comment events after joining a post room.

item.name: Chat
item.description: Conversations and messaging. Unified chat heartbeat batches presence/typing/read; operations endpoint batches common actions.

item.name: Storage
item.description: File storage utilities: sign upload/download URLs, list, metadata. Unified "sign" endpoint selects upload/download/chat modes.

item.name: Search
item.description: Global and scoped search. Unified search lets you fetch posts/users/communities (and trending) in one request.

item.name: Reports
item.description: User-facing reports across surfaces (feed, chat, men). Use unified creation endpoint to report any entity.

item.name: Admin
item.description: Moderator/Admin tools. Unified user action endpoint covers ban/unban/shadowban/logout-all in one route.

item.name: Jobs
item.description: Operational background tasks exposed via HTTP to trigger specific jobs like email and media cleanup.

item.name: Men Reviews
item.description: Men Reviews module: create and vote on reviews (red/green/unknown), threaded comments, and aggregation.
